meanings.definition: A hormone that stimulates growth in animals and humans.
meanings.sent1: Somatotropins are important for the growth of animals and humans.
meanings.sent2: Doctors may prescribe somatotropins to help children with growth issues.
meanings.sent3: The somatotropins in the body are like little builders, working hard to make us taller.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like the somatotropins, fueling her growth in every aspect of life.
meanings.sent5: The somatotropins act like magical potions, making everything they touch grow rapidly.

meanings.definition: Any of a group of hormones that promote growth and development in the body.
meanings.sent1: Athletes sometimes abuse somatotropins to enhance their performance.
meanings.sent2: Proper nutrition is essential for the body to produce somatotropins naturally.
meanings.sent3: The somatotropins in the body are like little gardeners, nurturing growth in every cell.
meanings.sent4: Hope can be the somatotropins of the soul, fostering personal development and resilience.
meanings.sent5: In the garden of life, somatotropins are the seeds that blossom into strength and vitality.
